column4: Is this the right place to ask about 10.04 Netbook edition stuff ?

Does anyone here know how to clear or disable the "Recent Files" section of the home screen on Ubuntu 10.04 Netbook Edition ? I can't find an option for it anywhere and there's no context menu for that section either.
use ubuntu-tweak to disable it (section gnome-preferences)
Thanks, I've got it disabled now.
